title: Helping nurses cope with postcode stress

title_detail.value: Helping nurses cope with postcode stress

summary: Understanding how nurses cope following the death of a patient after CPR may help identify nurses most at risk for postcode stress and posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD), according to new research.

summary_detail.value: Understanding how nurses cope following the death of a patient after CPR may help identify nurses most at risk for postcode stress and posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD), according to new research.
